name: places/ChIJ-bumc8pZwokRFkfDBHwT2Og
adrFormatAddress: 80 8th Ave #711, New York, NY 10011-5126, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr. James for a little over a year now and have only positive things to say about my experience working with him and his practice. Dr. James is insightful, attentive and caring, and he has guided me through some of the toughest times I’ve had over the past year. He always has useful tips and techniques for navigating a variety of different work and life situations that I’ve found incredibly helpful. I would definitely say that I am more confident, less anxious, and much happier now than I was a year ago! The clinic is also conveniently located and very calming. Billings, appointments and communications are also clear, efficient and flexible. I would definitely recommend!

originalText.text:
I've been a patient of Dr. James for nearly 4 years and my experience is always positive. He is a great listener and I credit a major aspect of my personal growth with the ideas and skills he's provided during our sessions.

Prescriptions, appointments, and billing have been a breeze from the beginning (even while navigating the back and forth with my insurance company.) I continue to look forward to my appointments as I always take away something new and beneficial.

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr. James for several years now. His expertise, compassion, and overall approach has a made a significant impact on my well-being. From the moment I met him, I felt welcomed and at ease. He has created a trusting and comfortable environment and has always taken the time to be available. I’m truly grateful for the personalized care and wholeheartedly recommend anyone in need to see Dr. James!

originalText.text: I have been working with Dr.James for almost 2 years, and being that he is my first therapist I have had he is kind and a great listener. Also, he will push you to your full potential but he is there to help you. The work is hard but you have to have patience and he has the patience. I would highly suggest you make an appointment with him,  or is other wonderful professionals he has within therapy connect.

originalText.text: I've been seeing Dr. James for over a year now and only wish I had started sooner. I love the holistic approach to actually integrate talk therapy and medication, rather than trying to manage them separately, and it's made a huge difference in my day-to-day life. He's super easy to talk to and very responsive whenever I need to get in touch with him outside our usual times.
